short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Onchainlinks is a web-extension built on chain that brings decentralization to you daily web application through the use of olinks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Revolutionize your online experience with Onchainlinks, the cutting-edge web extension built on the Base blockchain. Seamlessly integrate decentralization into your daily browsing and support your favorite content creators like never before.
Key Features:

Instant tipping with olinks: Show appreciation with a click
"Buy Me a Coffee" and more: Multiple ways to back your idols
Decentralized and secure: Powered by blockchain technology
Easy to use: Just install and start supporting

Transform every webpage into an opportunity to connect and contribute. With Onchainlinks, the future of creator support is just a button away.
Join the decentralized web revolution today!
